name: Purr Evil (Husky)
description:
Playing with a keyboard, using 'Up', 'Left', 'Down', 'Right' to move, 'Z' to dodge.

You need to plug in the 4 batteries to comfort the god, when you're moving, the god will chase you and try to attack you; when you're static, you're mostly safe.

...and because of the weird temper of the god, the AI is a little unpredictable sometimes...

Enjoy! :D

My LD 38 page.

This is a game made for Ludum Dare 38, the theme is "A Small World".
